casebody.data:
Harvey et al., Appellants, v. Shoup, Superintendent, et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Harvey v. Shoup (1995), 73 Ohio St.3d 714.]

(No. 94-2488 Submitted September 13, 1995 Decided October 4, 1995.) Briggs & Pry and R. David Briggs, for appellants. Joyce K. Laybom, for appellees.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Adamsky v. Buckeye Local School Dist. (1995), 73 Ohio St.3d 360, 653 N.E.2d 212.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents.
